name: Useless (MaybeFunGames)
description: (This game is not good, and development has stopped for it because of an other game I i'm creating. There are a few bugs but they shouldn't be major. Now, here's the description) you play as useless, a kid that thinks he's useless, he get's bullied by a kid called Garry. useless has always wanted to be someone, but he was nothing, but he seen something coins, and now he wants to get them all, so he can be someone. use arrow keys to move, click on stop signs to stop Garry , get all something coins and leave the school.
